propertyTitle: Luxury Villa with Private Pool, 1.3 Km Far from Sandy Beach, Grocery,Bars,Shops

blockData.title: Peace of mind when checking out through VRBO

locationDescription: The province of Trapani extends out in the western part of the region, between the Tyrrhenian Sea and the Canal of Sicily.

This enchanting land is composed of marvellous coasts alternated by steep cliffs and endless beaches. The archaeological remains and the small villages where the most authentic traditions are still part of daily life, make the province of Trapani a very attractive tourist destination.

The Trapani coast, one of the most impressive in Italy, comprises very valuable naturalistic spots such as the Gulf of Castellamare with its seafront full of cliffs and stacks alternating with beautiful beaches. Scopello is particularly renowned for its stacks and for its transparent sea. Part of this enchanting scenery is San Vito Lo Capo, with its white beaches and waters of the most brilliant hues.
The province encloses an extraordinary natural heritage, starting with the renowned Egadi Islands and the splendid volcanic isle of Pantelleria, true and proper oases to be discovered.

There are innumerable protected areas such as the Zingaro Natural Reserve, which stretches out along the coast and reefs, inlets and marine cliffs a sheer drop to the blue sea, covered by thick Mediterranean shrubs.

In proximity with Trapani, the particularly breathtaking landscapes are composed of saline banks from which wind mills arise. This is certainly one of the most important humid coastal zones, protected by the Trapani and Paceco Saline Natural Reserve.

The province is particularly renowned for the extraordinary cultural heritage spread all over its territory, from the archaeological area of Segesta, located in the coastal hinterland to Selinunte, Erice and the island of Mothia.
The city of Trapani presents an historical centre and several splendid monuments dating to different epochs, a unique and fascinating collection.
This corner of Sicily is special for its traditions, passed down through the centuries, always reserving new surprises for its visitors.
propertyDescription: In the Heart of the Amazing Gulf, ideal for families and small groups, walking distance from Beach Shop, restaurant, This Amazing Luxury House in Villa  benefits from its own private pool, big green garden and a spacious terrace fully furnished with a kitchen, BBQ, a large table and chairs to enable you to dine al fresco. There are 2 bedrooms and the living area with one single bed and sofa bed (it is up to 7 people), kitchen inside and outside. The Villa  is located just (1.3 km) from the sandy  beach. Quite and peaceful, the villa has easy access to all amenities, including the local markets and supermarkets (10 minutes by foot) as well as many excellent restaurants for eating out. WIFI FREEThere is plenty in the surrounding area to see and do during your stay. The Villa is close to : Palermo, Trapani, Erice,Segesta, San Vito Lo Capo, Corleone, Taormina, Cefalù, Scopello, Erice, Mondello Beach

reviewerDesc.reviewHeading: in the middle of the nature
reviewerDesc.review:
We spent few days in relax enjoying the sound of the nature, birds, flowers, olive trees and Piero cooking class. The pool was working with warm water and the weather like summer. The house is a bit far from the center but by car is only 5 minutes and Piero is always ready to give a lift to balestrate town with his car.
The house is cozy and clean ,  good spot for romantic vacation.

We already stayed in this villa, and we come back another time with a different family. Everithing was percet as usual.  Private Pool open also in the winter. Nice Garden..
 Hospitality of Natalia and Piero Super. They always check that all is ok, and let us find some delicious food in the House. We will come back for sure again.  Eugenio.

reviewerDesc.reviewHeading: one of the best place that i  have been in MY life
reviewerDesc.review: It was one of the best place that i  have been in MY life. confortable and very cosy. walking distance from Restaurant, Bar Supermarket. Around 1.3 km. Sandy Beach is very Close. The hospitality of the Owner is very Nice. Pool is totaly Private. Also GArden, We plan to comeback next year

The location of the house is very good, the owner is a very typical sicilian young man, smart and warm.
The house offer all you can desire when you are at the seaside, including style, silence and privacy. 
I reccomend this solution to whom are looking for a unique relax and beauty.
The Villa is very nice, suitable also in the winter: Big Garden, walking distance from Beach shop restaurant bar Supermarket. Piero and Natalia are very good Host. we will come back

reviewerDesc.reviewHeading: private Pool , relax, beach. What else?
reviewerDesc.review:
The VIlla has own private pool, and it is walking distance from
Beach, Restaurant, Shop, Supermarket. it consist of 2/3 bedrooms (it is actually 2 bedroom+ big iving room, with separate Kitchen), also kitchen and shower outside, terrace,wifi internet. Parking area.
Fantastic.

reviewerDesc.reviewHeading: Stunning villa with Private Pool, Next to Beach
reviewerDesc.review:
Stunning VIlla with Private Pool, 1.3 km far from beach.
The pool and the garden are very BIg. Parking area inside.
in 10 minutes, you can reach either the beach, either the center.
Natalia and Piero are very Good Host. Adolf and Family

reviewerDesc.reviewHeading: Amazing Villa with private pool next to beach
reviewerDesc.review:
This Villa of Natalia and PIero is lovely: Modern Style, 2/3 bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen outside and inside, BBQ, Pizza Owen, Big Private Pool, Big Garden. 
The Main Point? It is walking distance from Beach Shop restaurant Bar Supermarket. Around 1.4 km.
Natalia and Piero are wonderfull Host: we will come back
Frank and Family

Fantastic Villa, Amazing Town,Wonderful Host..What Else?
The villa has all that you wish to get :close to beach shop restaurant Bar supermarket. Natalia and Piero are Fantastic Host. they provided us fresh ricotta and other good things.  We really reccomend .

We spent 2 weeks using homeaway web site, and we stay in 2 houses with Natalia and Piero. One week in Palermo Area (
419234 )and another week in TRapani Area (in  the villa with pool)
The villa was Amazing. Very confortable and clean.
Natalia and Piero are very friendly and Nice people, Perfect Host.
We really reccomend Both Property and Natalia and Piero Company.
bellissima villetta complimenti

reviewerDesc.reviewHeading: Sicily is Beautiful, everithing was so perfect
reviewerDesc.review:
on June , my famility and I, decided to spent 2 weeks in Sicily. We found this lovely villa and booked with Natalia and PIero. Both are fluent in English, German, Russian and France. Italian off course-

They are very welcome and friendly people.
We spent the best time of ever.

Thank you

reviewerDesc.reviewHeading: Wonderful Stay: Amazing Villa, Amazing Host
reviewerDesc.review: We spent one week in the Villa Luxury Diamond. One family with your children. The place is really nice: indipendent pool. around 1 km far from Big Sandy Beach. Natalia is  very nice Host. We willl come back. 101%
La maison est plus petite que sur les photos et moins ordonnées. L endroit est chouette et la piscine très spacieuse. Un petit moins au niveau de l entretien de l extérieur comme de la maison!

Located on the outskirts of Balestrate, this villa satisfied our desire for a quiet location.  The unit itself was nicely equipped with comfortable furnishings.  The pool was great and the balcony area very nice.  Access to an outside kitchen and clothes washing machine was a bonus.  The beaches in Balestrate were beautiful and are highly recommended. Piero and Natalia were both very attentive and charming hosts.  Mosquitos at night were a problem, but the unit did have air-conditioning which alleviated that problem.  It was also nice to have private, secured parking for our car.

reviewerDesc.reviewHeading: Amazing Villa with pool close to the beach
reviewerDesc.review:
I went many times in Sicily but was my first time in "Villa", The house is really nice spacious bedroom, fully equipped kitchen a huge terrace and an amazing pool in a greeny area to have the perfect relax anytime. 
Thanks to Piero tips and suggestions we discovered nice places very close to Balestrate eating the best fish ever, cannoli, setteveli and others tipical sicilian specialities.
I definitely reccomand this accomodation as the best compromise to visit West Sicily.

The villa is really nice, with HIgh Quality of forniture.
Pool is private, There is Also a shower and kitchen outside,
BBQ , all that you can wishes.
The Big advantage is beeing walking distance from beach and Restaurant: around 1.5 km. The hospitality of the owner was very generous.We will come back

What we can see? Lot of memories: the Vila is really Nice with a Big space outside. Very good Furniture. Very good the hospitality of the owner during our stay.
within 15 minute walking you reach the center and all the place. we will come back

We stayed in this Luxury Villa in May.The pool is private and it is only up to you. The villas has High stardard Furniture, Big Gardend and Kitchen outside and Inside The owner live close to it but we never saw. We have our private access and our privacy. Hospitality upon arrival  and during our stay was Fantastic. The beach and restaurant are walking distance. We really reccomend it.

The property is nice and the owners easy-going. When we arrived it was a little bit too cold for us to use the pool, which is a nice to have in summer, I am sure. The owners life on the second floor, so your are not "alone" - but you would also not be alone in a hotel or pension. 
It is not complete luxus everything (e.g. the shower is quite small and old and the TV did not work), but compared to the normal sizilian standard you have everything you want.
The matresses are made of very nice visco-elastic material. 
The kidsroom is quite small - so not recommendable for e.g. for grown-up persons. 
It's kind of a way until you can buy sth or go to dinner, but it's ok. Our favorite restaurant was really great (Casa Rosa dei Venti), but also the little town itself is easy-going and not completely touristical. Also the beach is very nice and not too far away from the house.

There were some issues to discuss.First of all, the owner lives upstairs,(so it's not totally private),and there is only one bathroom.There are some repairs needed to the surroundings and garden furniture.The bedrooms are very dark and there no 
insect screens.
Nathalia and Pierro are very friendly people and solved some problems.
We had a nice holliday and enjoyed the baches of Balastrade  and the historic seens of Palermo.
